Would you like to learn about the controls?
Use WSAD to move player, hold SHIFT to run and use SPACE to jump.
Focus an object by standing nearby and looking its direction. Press E to interact.
Use I or TAB to open the inventory and use arrows or WSAD to move in the invetory.
